ygData.subject: OT: pulling question
ygData.msgSnippet: I know with the patch and what not (*cough* nerf) to feign death its no longer the be all end all pulling method... but could someone explain what was involved
ygData.messageBody:
I know with the patch and what not (*cough* nerf) to feign death its no
longer the be all end all pulling method... but could someone explain what
was involved in pulling just one mob (the Maestro past 15 others was
mentioned once)?

Email is fine so the list isn't spammed but lately I've been getting the nod
to pull from Mistmoore, which fine by me - I have some great no-mana-cost
tools available to me, but that place obviously involves technique.

Thanks,
-GW
<Tork@Nameless>
